mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.buy_id AS "buy.id", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.child_id AS "childId", a.comment AS "comment", a.comment_time AS "commentTime", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.title AS "buy.title"
LEFT JOIN gbj_buy b ON b.id = a.buy_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gbj_user_buy_comments( id, buy_id, parent_id, child_id, comment, comment_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{buy.id}, #{parentId}, #{childId}, #{comment}, #{commentTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gbj_user_buy_comments SET buy_id = #{buy.id}, parent_id = #{parentId}, child_id = #{childId}, comment = #{comment}, comment_time = #{commentTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gbj_user_buy_comments a
WHERE a.buy_id = #{id} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
